page.title: 02Playtime At School
page.content: Play times....Before school 8.30-9.00 Mid-morning 10.20-10.40,supervised by two teachers.Lunch time 12.00-12.30 1.00-1.15, supervised by part time Boys and girls do very different things. In the summer older boys play cricket in the playground in winter it is football. In summer, if the rec. is dry, we can go out there. This is good because the playground gets very crowded and little ones get knocked over. Every year there is a craze for playing marbles about Easter time and conkers in the autumn. Now the craze is Tennis because Wimbledon has started. Little boys seem to charge about and fight each other all the time. Classes take turns to play on the climbing frame and in the fort.
